[The Conception of Mary (The Barrenness of Anna)]

This matere here mad is of Ã¾e modyr of mercy how be joachym And Anne was here concepcion Sythe offred into Ã¾e temple compiled breffly than maryed to joseph and so folwyng Ã¾e salutacion Metyng with Elyzabeth and Ã¾er with a conclusyon in fewe wordys talkyd Ã¾at it xulde nat be tedyous to lernyd nyn to lewd nyn to no man of reson Ã¾is is Ã¾e processe Now preserve ?ow jhesus. Ã¾erfore of pes I ?ow pray all Ã¾at ben here present and tak hed to oure talkyn what we xal say I be-teche ?ow Ã¾at lorde Ã¾at is evyr omnypotent to governe ?ow in goodnes as he best may In hevyn we may hym se Now god Ã¾at is hevyn kynge sende us all hese dere blyssynge and to his towre he mote vs brynge Amen ffor Charyte. Quinque sunt Anne mater Samuelis Vxor Raguelis Vxor Tobie Mater beate Marie Anna prophetissa Est Ysakar Anne pater: Melophat sic quoque mater vel Nasaphat Ysakar The prestys of god offre sote Ensens Vn-to here god and Ã¾er fore they be holy we Ã¾at mynistere here in goddys presens in vs xuld be fownd no maner of foly Ysakar prynce of prestys am I Ã¾at Ã¾is holyest day here haue mynystracion Certyfyenge all tribus in my cure specyaly Ã¾at Ã¾is is Ã¾e hyest fest of oure solemnyzacion. This we clepe festum Encenniorum Ã¾e newe ffest of which iij in Ã¾e ?ere we exercyse now all Ã¾e kynredys to jerusalem must cum In to Ã¾e temple of god here to do sacryfyse Tho Ã¾at be cursyd my dygnyte is to dysspyse and Ã¾o Ã¾at be blyssyd here holy sacrefyse to take We be regal sacerdocium it perteyneth vs to be wysse be fastyng be prayng be almes and at du tyme to wake. Joachym Now all Ã¾is countre of Galyle with Ã¾is cetye of Nazareth specyal Ã¾is ffest to jerusalem must go we to make sacrefyce to god eternal My name is joachym a man in godys substancyall Joachym is to say he Ã¾at to god is redy so haue I be and evyr more xal Ffor Ã¾e dredful domys of god sore dred I. I am clepyd Ryghtful why wole ?e se Ffor my godys in to thre partys I devyde On to Ã¾e temple and to hem Ã¾at Ã¾er servyng be A nodyr to Ã¾e pylgrimys and pore men Ã¾e iijd e ffor hem with me abyde So xulde euery curat in Ã¾is werde wyde ?eve a part to his chauncel i-wys A part to his parochonerys Ã¾at to povert slyde the thryd part to kepe for hym and his. But blyssyd wyff anne sore I drede In Ã¾e temple Ã¾is tyme to make sacryfice be-cawse Ã¾at no frute of vs doth procede I fere me grettly Ã¾e prest wole me dysspice Than grett slawndyr in Ã¾e tribus of vs xulde aryse but Ã¾is I Avow to god with all Ã¾e mekenes I can ?yff of his mercy he wole a childe us devyse we xal offre it up in to Ã¾e temple to be goddys man. Anna ?our swemful wurdys make terys trekyl down be my face i-wys swete husbond Ã¾e fawte is in me my name is Anne Ã¾at is to sey grace we wete not how gracyous god wyl to us be A woman xulde bere cryst Ã¾ese profecyes haue we if god send frute and it be a mayd childe with all reuerens I vow to his mageste sche xal be here foot mayd to mynyster here most mylde. Joachym Now lete be it as god wole Ã¾er is no more tweyn turtelys ffor my sacryfice with me I take and I be-seche wyff and evyr we mete more Ã¾at hese grett mercy vs meryer mut make. Anna For dred and ffor swem of ?our wourdys I qwake thryes I kysse ?ow with syghys ful sad and to Ã¾e mercy of god mekely I ?ow be-take and Ã¾o Ã¾at departe in sorwe god make Ã¾er metyng glad. Senior tribus Worchepful sere joachym be ?e redy now all ?our kynrede is come ?ow to exorte Ã¾at Ã¾ei may do sacrifice at Ã¾e temple with ?ow Ffor ?ow be of grett wurchep as men ?ow report. Joachym All synfull seke and sory god mote comforte I wolde I were as men me name Thedyr in goddys name now late us all resorte A Anne Anne Anne god scheeld us fro shame. Anne Now am I left alone sore may I wepe A husbond a-geyn god wel mote ?ow brynge And fro shame and sorwe he mote ?ow kepe tyl I se ?ow a-geyn I kan not sees of wepynge. Senior Prynce of oure prestys if it be ?our plesynge we be com mekely to make our sacrefice. Ysakar God do ?ow mede bothe elde and ?ynge than devowtly we wyl begynne servyse. There they xal synge Ã¾is sequens Benedicta sit beata trinitas And in Ã¾at tyme Ysakar with his ministerys ensensyth Ã¾e Autere and Ã¾an Ã¾ei make her offryng and Isaker seyth Comyth up serys and offeryth all now ?e Ã¾at to do sacryfice worthy are A-byde a qwyle sere Whedyr wytte Ã¾ou Ã¾ou and Ã¾i Wyff arn barrany and bare neyther of ?ow ffruteful nevyr ?ett ware Whow durste ?ou a-monge fruteful presume and Abuse It is a tokyn Ã¾ou art cursyd Ã¾are Whereffore with grett indygnacion Ã¾in offeryng I refuse. et refudit sacrificium Joachim. amonge all Ã¾is pepyl barreyn be no mo therefore comyth up and offeryth here alle Ã¾ou joachym I charge Ã¾e fast out Ã¾e temple Ã¾ou go et redit flendo. than with goddys holy wourde blysse ?ow I shalle ministro cantando Adiutorium nostrum in nomine domini Qui fecit celum et terram Sit nomen domini benedictum Ex hoc nunc et usque in seculum Chorus minister chorus Episcopus Benedicat vos diuina maiestas et vna deitas Pater et filius et spiritus sanctus chorus. Amen. Signando manu cum cruce solenniter et recedant tribus extra templum. Now of god and man blyssyd be ?e alle homward a-?en now returne ?e And in Ã¾is temple A-byde we xalle to servyn god in trinyte. Joachym A mercyfful lord what is this lyff What haue I do lorde to haue Ã¾is blame Ffor hevynes I dare not go hom to my wyff And amonge my neyborys I dare not abyde ffor shame A Anne Anne Anne Al our joye is turnyd to grame Ffrom ?our blyssyd ffelacheppe I am now exilyd and ?e here onys of Ã¾is ffowle fame sorwe wyl sle ?ow to se me thus revylyd. but son god soferyth thys vs must sofron nede now wyl I go to my sherherdys and with hem abyde and Ã¾er evyr more levyn in sorwe and in drede shame makyth many man his hed for to hyde ha how do ?e felas in ?ow is lytel pryde how fare ?e and my bestys Ã¾is wete wolde I veryly. Primus pastor A welcom hedyr blyssyd mayster we pasture hem ful wyde they be lusty and fayr and grettly multyply how de ?e mayster ?e loke al hevyly how doth oure dame at hom sytt she and sowyht. Joachym to here Ã¾e speke of here it sleyth myn hert veryly how I and sche doth god hym self knowyth The meke god lyftyth up Ã¾e proude over throwyht Go do what ?e lyst se ?our bestys not stray. iius pastor Aftere grett sorwe mayster evyr gret grace growyht Sympyl as we kan we xal for ?ow pray. iiius pastor ?a to pray ffor careful it is grett nede we all wul prey ffor ?ow knelende god of his goodnes send ?ow good spede and of ?our sorwe ?ow sone amende. Joachym I am nott wurthy lord to loke up to hefne my synful steppys Anvemynyd Ã¾e grounde I loth-folest Ã¾at levyth Ã¾ou lord hyest in Ã¾i setys sefne What art Ã¾ou lord What am I wrecche werse Ã¾an an hownde Ã¾ou hast sent me shame which myn hert doth wounde I thank Ã¾e more here fore Ã¾an for all my prosperite Ã¾is is a tokyn Ã¾ou lovyst me now to the I am bounde Ã¾ou seyst Ã¾ou art with hem Ã¾at in tribulacion be. And ho so haue Ã¾e he nedyth not care thanne my sorwe is feryng I haue do sum offens punchyth me lorde and spare my blyssyd wyff anne Ã¾at syttyth and sorwyth ful sore of myn Absens Ther is not may profyte but prayour to ?our presens With prayorys prostrat by-fore Ã¾i person I wepe haue mende on oure a-vow for ?our mech magnyficens and my lovyngest wyff Anne lord for Ã¾i mercy kepe. Anna A mercy lord mercy mercy mercy we are synfolest it shewyth Ã¾at ?e send us all Ã¾is sorwe Why do ?e thus to myn husbond lord why why why for my barynes he may amend Ã¾is Ã¾i self and Ã¾ou lyst to morwe And it plese so Ã¾i mercy Ã¾e my lord I take to borwe I xal kepe myn a-vow qwhyl I leve and leste I fere me I haue offendyd Ã¾e myn hert is ful of sorwe most mekely I pray Ã¾i pety Ã¾at Ã¾is bale Ã¾ou wyl breste. Joachym here Ã¾e Aungel descendith Ã¾e hefne syngyng Exultet celum laudibus resultet terra gaudijs Archangelorum gloria sacra canunt solemnia. Qwhat art Ã¾ou in goddys name Ã¾at makyst me a-drad It is as lyth a-bowt me as al Ã¾e werd were fere. Angelus I am an Aungel of god com to make Ã¾e glad God is plesyd with Ã¾in helmes and hath herd Ã¾i prayere He seyth Ã¾i shame Ã¾i repreff and Ã¾i terys cler God is a vengere of synne and not nature doth lothe Whos wombe Ã¾at he sparyth and maketh barreyn her he doth to shewe his myth and his mercy bothe. Thu seest Ã¾at Sara was nynty ?ere bareyn sche had a son Ysaac to whom god ?aff his blyssynge Rachel also had Ã¾e same peyn She had a son joseph Ã¾at of Egypt was kynge A strongere Ã¾an sampson nevyr was be wrytynge nor an holyere Ã¾an samuel it is seyd thus ?ett here moderys were bareyn bothe in Ã¾e gynnynge Ã¾e concepcion of all swych it is ful mervelyous. And in Ã¾e lyke wyse Anne Ã¾i blyssyd wyff sche xal bere a childe xal hygth mary which xal be blyssyd in here body and haue joys ffyff and ful of Ã¾e holy goost inspyred syngulyrly Sche xal be offryd in to Ã¾e temple solemply Ã¾at of here non evyl ffame xuld sprynge thus And as sche xal be bore of a barrany body So of here xal be bore with-out nature Jhesus. Ã¾at xal be savyour That xal be savyour vnto al man-kende In tokyn whan Ã¾ou come to jherusalem to Ã¾e gyldyn gate Ã¾ou xalt mete anne Ã¾i wyff haue Ã¾is in Ã¾i mende I xal sey here Ã¾e same here sorwys to rebate. Joachym Of Ã¾is imcomparabyl comfort I xal nevyr for-gete Ã¾e date my sorwe was nevyr so grett but now my joy is more I xal hom in hast be it nevyr so late A Anne blyssyd be Ã¾at body of Ã¾e xal be bore. Now fare wel myn shepherdys governe ?ow now wysly. 1us pastor Haue ?e good tydyngys mayster Ã¾an be we glad. Joachym Prayse god for me for I am not wourthy. ijus pastor In feyth sere so we xal with all oure sowlys sad. iijus pastor I holde it helpfful Ã¾at on of vs with ?ow be had. Joachym Nay abyde with ?our bestys sone in goddys blyssynge. 1us pastor we xal make us so mery now Ã¾is is be-stad Ã¾at a myle on ?our wey ?e xal here us synge. Anne Alas ffor myn husbond me is ful wo I xal go seke hym what so evyr be falle I wote not in erth which wey is he go ffadyr of hefne ffor mercy to ?our ffete I falle. Angelus Anne Ã¾in husbond ryght now I was withall Ã¾e aungel of god Ã¾at bar hym good tydynge and as I seyd to hym so to Ã¾e sey I xal god hath herd Ã¾i preyour and Ã¾i wepynge At Ã¾e goldyn gate Ã¾ou xalte mete hym ful mylde and in grett gladnes returne to ?our hous So be proces Ã¾ou xalt conseyve and bere A childe Whiche xal hyght mary and mary xal bere jhesus Which xal be savyour of all Ã¾e werd and us Aftere grett sorwe evyr grett gladnes is had now myn inbassett I haue seyd to ?ow thus gooth in oure lordys name and in god beth glad. Anne Now blyssyd be oure lorde and all his werkys ay All heffne and erthe mut blysse ?ow for this I am so joyful I not what I may say Ã¾er can no tounge telle what joye in me is I to bere a childe Ã¾at xal bere all mannys blys and haue myn hosbonde a-geyn ho myth haue joys more no creature in erth is grauntyd more mercy i-wys I xal hy?e me to Ã¾e ?ate to be Ã¾er before. here goth Ã¾e Aungel A-?en to hefne. A blyssyd be our lord myn husbond I se I xalle on myn knes and to hym-ward crepe. Joachym A gracyous wyff Anne now fruteful xal ?e be Ffor joy of Ã¾is metyng in my sowle I wepe Haue Ã¾is kusse of clennesse and with ?ow it kepe in goddys name now go we wyff hom to our hous. Anne Ã¾er was nevyr joy sank in me so depe now may we sey husbond god is to us gracyous veryly. Joachym ?a and if we haue levyd wel here be-fore I pray Ã¾e lord Ã¾in ore so mote we levyn evyr more And be Ã¾i grace more holyly. Anne Now hom-Ward husbond I rede we gon Ryth hom al to our place to thank god Ã¾at sytt in tron Ã¾at Ã¾us hath sent us his grace.
